markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Brimstone Fumes](/Equipment.aspx?ID=109)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Evil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=64" />
<trait label="Inhaled" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=96" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 551 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 1,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Fumes from the forges of [Hell](/Planes.aspx?ID=18) drain health and strength alike. 

**Saving Throw** DC 36 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 round; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 7d6 poison damage and [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 round); **Stage 2** 8d6 poison damage and enfeebled 2 (1 round); **Stage 3** 10d6 poison damage and enfeebled 3 (1 round)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Brimstone Fumes
